name: Georgy Ginzburg
summary: Backend Developer with experience in Golang and microservices, building REST/WebSocket/gRPC APIs, data pipelines and ML model integrations; open-source contributor to FerretDB; experience with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Kafka, Docker, Linux and cloud tooling.

experience.title: Golang Developer
experience.description: Developed microservice backend in Golang for an educational platform; worked with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis; implemented APIs (REST, WebSocket, gRPC) and Kafka features; fixed non-obvious bugs affecting virtual environment sessions, REST, and gRPC to increase stability.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
experience.description: Collaborated with Data Scientists to build data transformation pipelines and deliver ML models to production; built REST APIs for model predictions in Python; projects included a recommendation system and a fraud detection service.

experience.title: Open-source Contributor
experience.description: Contributed to FerretDB, an open-source MongoDB-compatible database written in Golang using PostgreSQL as the document store; gained deep understanding of MongoDB subtleties.

experience.title: Open-source Project / Hackathon Project
experience.description: Worked on Apache Ranger and OpenSearch integration; part of a Samsung summer school event/hackathon (Sept 2021); proposed a solution to integrate OpenSearch with Apache Ranger authentication and placed 2nd out of 20 participants.
